parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: The resource ID. You can specify a maximum of 20 IDs at a time. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

*   **video**: video files.
*   **image**: image files.
*   **attached**: auxiliary media assets.

parameters.name: TargetAppId
parameters.description: The ID of the application to which resources are migrated. Default value: **app-1000000**. For more information, see [Use the multi-application service](~~113600~~).
